name: Laughingstock Apocalypse
description:
An unfinished PSX sandbox made for the fab A Game By Its Cover 2021 jam. Let's call this an exercise in ~world building~

Recommended for the wretched souls who liked the first thirty mins of Tarkovsky's Solaris more than the rest (like moi)

CONTROLS:

  • w,s,a,d / move
  • space bar / jump, select
  • esc / quit
  • arrow keys / operate menu

IMPORTANT!! the menu is not accessible once you enter one of the three worlds, i.e. you must reboot the game to access another world. I will fix this ASAP.

credits + thank you's to:

  • Elegant Crow for the lush Retro PSX Style Tree Pack
  • chilly_durango for 3D Retro Shacks Shanties Sheds & Gantries
  • Texturer, Pexels, Artbreeder for textures and inspiration
  • Christina Antoinette for the JinxedWizards font    
  • The good people of the AGBIC discord and the organizers of this jam!!

thanks to YOU for checking this out :)
